item.description:
Judi are doing the Kinsman's this Sunday (Sept.21th) in case you or anyone else is interested.




Sun 9/21/08 The Kinsmans
North & South Kinsmans via Mt. Kinsman Trail to the Kinsman Ridge Trail to North Kinsman and then South Kinsman

(10.0 miles RT 3,900' gain allow 8+ hours - distance between the peaks is just under 1 mile).

This is a really pretty hike with nice views along the ridge trail and peaks. Dogs welcome.


Mt. Kinsman Trailhead Directions

Take the Franconia exit of I-93 (Exit 38). Go left off that off-ramp.
From the east side of Rte 116 at Franconia - Easton Town Line it is 4.3 miles south of NH 18 in Franconia Village and 2 miles east of the Easton Town Hall. The sign for the Town Hall is a few yards north of the trail but the trail itself does not have a sign. The trial follows a logging road at a prominent chain link gate across 2 stone pillars opposite a building with a large garage and a few hundred yards past a bown 'historic marker' sign. You have to park off to the side of the road.
you RSVP and keep your response up to date.
item.how_to_find_us: If you want the details, please contact [url=mailto:anderblit@earthlink.net]Judi
item.name: The Kinsmans
